mapper.sql: select equipment_id, equipment_code, equipment_version, equipment_status, hospital_code, department_code, equipment_type, patient_phone_aes, p_id, on_off_status from equipment
mapper.select:
SELECT equipment.equipment_code,equipment_type,COUNT(*) AS count, GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT patient_management.patient_phone_aes ) AS patient_phone_aes FROM equipment JOIN patient_management ON equipment.equipment_code = patient_management.equipment_code INNER JOIN sys_user ON patient_management.patient_phone_aes = sys_user.phonenumber_aes
and patient_management.ecg_type LIKE concat('%',#{ecgType})
and patient_management.patient_phone_aes = #{patientPhone}
and equipment.equipment_code like concat('%', #{equipmentCode}, '%')
GROUP BY equipment.equipment_code order by count desc

SELECT hospital.hospital_name as hospitalName, equipment_id, equipment_code, equipment_version, equipment_status, equipment_type FROM equipment INNER JOIN hospital ON equipment.hospital_code = hospital.hospital_code where equipment_code = #{equipmentCode} limit 1
mapper.insert:
insert into equipment
equipment_id, equipment_code, equipment_version, equipment_status, hospital_code, department_code, equipment_type, patient_phone_aes, p_id,
#{equipmentId}, #{equipmentCode}, #{equipmentVersion}, #{equipmentStatus}, #{hospitalCode}, #{departmentCode}, #{equipmentType}, #{patientPhone}, #{pId},
mapper.update: update equipment set equipment_status = 'False' where equipment_status = 'True'

update equipment set equipment_status = 'True' where equipment_code in
#{equipmentCode}
update equipment set equipment_status = #{equipmentStatus} ,patient_phone_aes = null where equipment_id = #{equipmentId}
update equipment set equipment_status = 'False' where equipment_code = #{equipmentCode}
mapper.delete:
delete from equipment where equipment_id in
#{equipmentId}
